name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simagizer - OpenAI ChatGPT Summary To Image

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a convenient solution for summarizing selected text on a webpage and generating a visual representation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension for web browsers that enables users to summarize text from a webpage and create a visual representation of the summary. The summarized text can be presented in the form of an image that can be easily shared on social media or downloaded for later use. This extension provides a simple and efficient way to condense long articles or documents into a more manageable and readable format.
